website_summaries.verdict: These adorable pink flamingos look right at home in any pool and do a great job of keeping drinks afloat.
pros: Well-balanced construction doesn't tip easily and can even handle a few gentle waves, knocks, and bumps
Beautifully detailed design puts similar drink holders in the shade

customer_reviews.title: Stable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's bearded dragon, Tad, as a tub float. And even though we didn't get it for it's intended purpose, I can say that it is very stable and durable. Even with Tad shifting his weight around, it never tipped. And he also didn't puncture it with his claws. I'm going to order another set to take to the lake this summer for our drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little birds...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They work great, no tipping issues at all. These little guys just float around the pool on their own like an inflatable bartender. I found cups and cans fit perfectly snug (even with a koozie). I leave my koozie on my bottles for a secure fit and have never had a problem. They can take a soft bounce or a firm push without issues, but don't expect them to stay upright with excessive horseplay or while doing belly flops next to them. That would be unreasonable given what they are used for. I have a small inflatable pool used mostly for socializing with adults and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: ... ones I saw but the less expensive ones got bad quality reviews so I thought I would try this ...
customer_reviews.text: This was more expensive than other similar ones I saw but the less expensive ones got bad quality reviews so I thought I would try this one. I do have to say that they work! My husband and I tested them today and they held up at a little water park going down a lazy river. He had a can of Coke in his and mine was a cup with water and both stayed upright and floated perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: CHEETAHS RULE

customer_reviews.title: It took like 2 seconds to modify it and then it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Your going to have to cut an X in the bottom to actually be able to float anything bigger than a standard can or solo cup (which it had no problem with). It took like 2 seconds to modify it and then it had no issues with sturdy heavy cups plus it was super cute! We used them 7 days in a row on a camping/float trip without any issue and plan to use them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Ron & Tobeylee Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Really liked them while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These were fun. They work better with cans and short glasses than with tall sip cups which sometimes cause them to tip. The problem is that two of them started losing air within the month and are not usable any more (can't find the leak so it's likely a seam}. The company asks that you contact them with a problem before reviewing, which I did, only to get a message after the mail was, for the time being, undeliverable. I'm giving them another shot and I bought the sharks drink holders. I'll update this review if and after I get a response from the company and after I determine if the "sharks' work better.
customer_reviews.author: Cageguy

customer_reviews.title: Great floats
customer_reviews.text: Exceedingly happy with these drink floats. I purchased and received the parrots. They’re made of thick material and the printing on them is clear and bright. They don’t wobble or topple over even in a busy pool, though will not support drink cups like a Yeti. They’re both too narrow and not heavy enough to keep cooler cups afloat. We liked them so much we bought a second set of 18 from another seller — they’re knockoffs of this company’s styles and not nearly as well made. In the future I would come back to this brand to replace mine.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Test

customer_reviews.title: GoFloat is the only brand to buy!
customer_reviews.text: GoFloat is the only brand that really works for stability. We bought adorable crabs from a competitor and only 2 out of 6 stayed plugged in and inflated. In comparison, the GoFloats are very sturdy and will not dump your beverage in the pool. Highly recommended for vacations.. always a hit at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby unicorns!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a drink holder and it's super adorable. It matches the giant unicorn raft. The fit is snug and we couldnt get the drink rafts to tip even when we tried in the pool. like the giant raft, but these are SUPER cute. They appear to be made of heavy duty material like a raft. I received these in exchange for my honest review and opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Extra Small Red Cup
customer_reviews.text: The cup holder is very small. It will snugly hold a 16 oz water bottle no problem. But if you try to put a standard red cup in holder you can only get it about 1 inch in making it very easy to spill. The pictures they are deceiving. But you want it to hold a water bottle or a plastic 16 oz soda bottle they will be perfect! I wanted them to hold a cocktail glass or a regular red cup and it will not do that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as sort of a gag gift for a pool party, and they were a huge hit! Very stable and drinks didn't tip. We even had bottles of beer in ours - didn't work as well with a completely full bottle, but once you drink down past the neck of the bottle, these things work like magic. Didn't use a coozie or anything for stability and they still worked great. Also as an added bonus, they provided hours of enjoyment when we decided to put them on our hands and knees and try to self-propel around the pool. Laughter ensued. Memories were made.
customer_reviews.author: CEFeliciano

customer_reviews.title: They're delightful
customer_reviews.text: These silly little unicorns are great. They inflate easily (you won't give yourself a headache, even if you inflate them all at once) and do fold down to their smaller size again with ease. Most (though not all!) cups work well in this--it works especially well with cans and shorter bottles. One thing that was a little annoying, leading to my 4 star review, is that if the float is properly inflated and full of air, it's a bit difficult to take your drinks out of the float--so you just wind up lifting the whole thing and smacking yourself in the eye with a unicorn horn.
customer_reviews.author: Grumplestiltskin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for a swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: I got these for our hot tub. Then I realized you can't put cold drinks in it lol because the hot water melts the ice in your drink with in 5 minutes lol However they are super super cute for a swimming pool or lounging on the Lake. We used real glass in hours for our drinks and they held up and floated nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: OHHHH! This is awesome! I can float around my pool while the gator chases me with my beer! Very stable with a long neck bottle- it just won't tip. Snug enough around the bottle that it stays on while you sip. I am delighted with this product! Seller was great; package arrived on time with a nice thank you in the box. I recommend them! (Sorry about the sideways photo, but you notice, he still didn't spill my beer!)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as they match a large unicorn pool float that I received as a gift. These ate just adorable and so much fun in the pool. They're sturdy enough to handle a lot of play in the pool and the rigor of pulling cans in and out of these guys. They're big enough to handle the waves of some rough play in the pool without toppling over and everyone can grab their drinks without getting out of the pool. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderer "Wendy"

customer_reviews.title: Large red cups easily fit in the holders and they were sturdy while ...
customer_reviews.text: These drinks floats were a huge hit at my America themed pool party. Large red cups easily fit in the holders and they were sturdy while floating around in the pool (unlike other companies' floats I've ordered). People thought they were super fun and festive and were asking where I got them. We've used them multiple times since our party and they're still going strong and have not faded (again, like others I've ordered). Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Raven H.

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked with how sturdy these are
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked with how sturdy these are. People have cannonballed into the pool less than a foot away from my runaway drink and it didn't capsize. If there's any current, your drink will wander away, but that's to be expected. More of an issue is that there is no air pocket on the bottom, so you will end up with very warm beer very quickly. I removed a star for this reason. I kept it at 4 stars because it does seem to be the best option for this type of product.... at least it doesn't dump your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stable for drinks. They look just like the photo in the description.
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty much just like the picture shows them. I was surprised at how stable they are in the pool. I haven't had any problems and they are really cute floating around or sitting beside the pool while in use. Like most blow up pool supplies, they fold up into a very small package when deflated. The drinks do need to be fit in snuggly to the opening, you need two hands to get a drink out, but that really helps keeping the drink out of the pool water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knock

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super cute floaties for your drinks. Easy to inflate but don't leave out in the sun for days otherwise they will deflate obviously. Keep indoors when not in use. Fun way to enjoy the pool with drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Reenz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a cute addition to the pool. They’re a good conversation piece while social distancing outside and they inflate easily and float well. The biggest drawback is that it’s easier to pick up the float and your drink to take a sip as opposed to taking the drink out of the float, which can be a little awkward. I’d definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Best drink holders for you pool
customer_reviews.text: These are great drink floats. Because of their large size they won’t tip over in the pool. Great for tall beers or oversized drinks. I bought (6) or two packages worth every penny. Also look very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dana P Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jacuzzi tub
customer_reviews.text: We used these pink flamingo floating drink holders in a jetted tub at a hotel on vacation and they worked well. They blew up all the way and didn't leak and they didn't tip over even when the jets were on. They're very cute and fun to use. It's kind of strange that they come 3 to a box but we used the extra one to hold another cup with some pretzels. They were pretty cool and we might get another set, maybe a different style even, if we go on a trip with a group.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Icy dragon drink gods
customer_reviews.text: Never be far from your cocktails! There are awesome and don’t tip. Well, if you are blasted and cannonball into a pool filled with sweet cocktails floating on icy dragons they do, but that’s no fault of the dragon. You need these in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Palm Tree Top-Heavy--Won't Hold Drink
customer_reviews.text: The concept of these is cute. They were shipped quickly, they looked cute, the quality is nice, and the price is a great deal for 3 of them. I gave 3 stars for that. However, the palm tree is too top heavy and won't balance a floating drink in the water. Tips over. Doesn't serve the purpose they are meant to serve. They will float if lighter objects are placed in them, such as jewelry. Don't want the hassle of returning them for the price so I'm trying to brainstorm other uses. Disappointed that I can't use them for what I bought them for though.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Party gater!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on a lake trip-- loved them and so did everyone else. I tied a "leash" around it's neck and then referred to it as my party gater for the rest of the day. Lots of fun, great item for laughs. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. They hold cans and bottles in thin coozies. Noticed that not all 3 are centered correctly. One is off a bit and causes the beverage to lean all the time. It eventually tipped over after someone jumped in the pool so we are down to 2. I think if the hole was an inch deeper and a half inch wider it would help tremendously and allow for taller insulated cups to be used. It would also be nice to have a loop or ring attached so you can tie them off. They tend to float away if there is any current or wind.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn pool party
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a unicorn pool party! Everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit more expensive per unit but they are worth it. I was fairly surprised when they held upright in the wind. They are pretty sturdy with a regular can. Haven't tried them with an insulated cup yet but happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: G.Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Big Mouth brand drink floats for the simple fact that they seem to be better made and they are easy to inflate. These drink floats took a lot more effort to inflate and they are wrinkled after they're inflated. (Maybe because the material is thicker.) I am fairly pleased with the end result. I used my unicorn drink floats to hold mini champagne bottles for my birthday. They hold 187ml bottles perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Seriously one of our favorite things about the Hot Tub now
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of our favorite things about the Hot Tub now. They work great. Your drinks do not tip over! Customer service has been amazing. They have all sorts of wonderful products. Make your summer fun and get some of these things. SO CUTE!!!! They were a wonderful addition to the party we threw our daughter for graduation as well! Well made, thick seams. These should last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Gibbs850

customer_reviews.title: Great value and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Don’t go for imitations- these are by far the best. Sturdy and can hold your drink They have lasted 2 +years Wow Such cute unicorns !
customer_reviews.author: CBPB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to backyard Summer
customer_reviews.text: These palm tree drink floats are perfect. Sturdy - not cheap flimsy plastic, easy to inflate, and just colorful & fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool time drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect addition to the pool. Holds my beer and doesn't tip over, even when someone does a cannonball in the pool. I didn't believe it until I saw it.
customer_reviews.author: gabba

customer_reviews.title: A hit at the pool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the ice dragon drink floats for an all inclusive vacation, they were an absolute hit at the pool. They were great, and helped me keep track of my drink. The kids loved to play with them too. Great quality and easy to blow up!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna R.

customer_reviews.title: Already ordered more to have a family of crocs in the pool!!!
customer_reviews.text: These guys are amazing!!!! Super size, and with how the arms are bent they definitely won’t tip over even with a full red cup!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing worse than holding your drink while floating
customer_reviews.text: Once you get and use these floating drink holders, you will wonder what took you so long to buy them. There is nothing worse than holding your drink while floating, only for the drink to get warm 10x faster. Problem solved...float it right next to you with these well made floats! I was also super impressed that the colors actually looked like the picture! A total hit for social media pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have Cup Holders !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Holds cups with no problem. Easy to inflate. Would definitely recommend for the pool or just lounging at the lake. Everyone ask me where did I get them from.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love these guys
customer_reviews.text: In a red plastic cup your drink is stable. Can of beer works also. They are so fun roaming around the pool. I would suggest a tether so you don’t have to go chasing them
customer_reviews.author: DST

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great floativity, very sturdy and cup holder is deep to fit even bottle in them. I love them, my dog is scared of them:)
customer_reviews.author: Margaryta Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute plus they work! Everyone comments on the fire breathing dragons - very Game of Thrones
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gag birthday gift for someone who recently built a pool and it ended up being the favorite gift of all! Also doubles as a barbie doll intertube! They actually hold a drink well and float, super fun addition to the pool. Pleasantly surprised with the quality and size. Great for the skinny hard seltzer cans, a plastic party cup, or a regular sized can
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit, Brought these on vacation with us to fit our Tervis 16oz cups in while at pool bar. So many people came up to us and loved them. Good conversation starter and way to get to know people from all over. We solved an issue of them floating too far away from us by tying a sting to the tree and attaching to our floats.
customer_reviews.author: Nasren

customer_reviews.title: What great customer service
customer_reviews.text: What great customer service. First off these floats are so cool. Bought them for a friends pool as a gift. Bought 2 packs of 3. One of the 6 had a small hole on a seam and I contacted the seller. Just wanted to exchange the 1, but they sent me an entire new 3 pack. If your looking for a cool beverage float look no further..,
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Saffioti

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates them
customer_reviews.text: They float, they hold a drink, they are perfect. The only problem is that the dog has the need to kill them...
customer_reviews.author: Rob311

customer_reviews.title: Good for small drinks
customer_reviews.text: If you're using a can drink or a solo cup, it probably does a good job. Anything taller than that will tip over. And the hole is small so anything bigger around than a can is too big.
customer_reviews.author: MistyHfromTx

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and literally holds a solo cup filled to the brim without tipping or sinking. I even bought neon pink solo cups to match. Very durable and worth every penny. I bought them to prevent me having to reach over the pool each time I wanted to drink. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have floating around the pool. Helps hold your cup use a lid. Also not that sturdy. Wind will blow over cup. However I used a lid and kept my hand on it. It also helped lay my cup down outside the pool and it held my cup up but NOT going to hold your cup in the pool very long. Still cute
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lee Rosenhahn

customer_reviews.title: Great drink holder
customer_reviews.text: Love them, my wife, mother of our dragons, and our dragons love them lol
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Depending on how heavy your drink is though they can tip over easily
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the beach and pools!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pools and the beach! Fits a solo cup perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Put your drink into whike you float around in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used in my Jacuzzi today!! Held a full bottle of Bluemoon beer perfectly!! Geat product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful gag, and very useful. Cans of soda or beer fit in wonderfully...bottles work after you've drunk about half of the content, or they will tip.. We're debating how to personalize the floatmingoes so each person knows which one holds his/her particular drink...little necklaces perhaps? Or just write names on them with a Sharpie? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bummer Girl Summer
customer_reviews.text: Before we even got them in the pool, 1 out 3 was a dud. (TOP ONE) Disappointed that we only got 2 out of the set. They cute but that's about it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lil stormster

customer_reviews.title: Fun, funky, fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! These little guys exactly as hoped. They’re actually ok with cups that aren’t top-heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Needs A Cocktail

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! So cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I get compliments on them all the time. They will fit most any cups, bottles or cans and they won't tip over 99& of the time. We did have a party-goer test the limit and his eventually tipped over but had to REALLY try to get it to do so. We bought similar products, in flamingo shapes, from a different supplier and the holes would not fit ANYTHING - not a coke can, not any glasses, not even a skinny red bull can. So you get what you pay for - choose these instead!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great floats!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little cuties! They easily support my regular size Tervis tumblers and bottle of beer! Perfect little addition to my Florida farm little pool!
customer_reviews.author: John O’Neill

customer_reviews.title: Beach hit
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended but I could float while holding on to it...they are so cute got tons of compliments...stayed afloat with beer bottles...I think one time the bottle flipped all the way over but I still drank it LOL
customer_reviews.author: queen crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Florida Man Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: I made a Florida Man costume for my husband and he wore it happily.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drink holders
customer_reviews.text: We first learned of drink floats when we were looking for a housewarming gift for our friends. We bought them the alligator floats. They are so cute in the pool and very functional. So I decided it was time to get some for our pool. They work well and don't take up alot of space in the pool like the floating coolers. Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Msdolphin

customer_reviews.title: Stays afloat, holds a beer with a coozie on it
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got them as a fathers day gift and we all enjoyed them! I was surprised that the beers still fit in these floaties even with a coozie on. Very sturdy, did not tip easy. Would recommend to any of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Took these to a party and they worked great! Inflatables this small are very light do while they hold cans of beer just fine, they also float away from you very quickly, so you have to keep an eye on them. However once inflated you can hook empty ones by the dragon’s head on the side of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, floats well and hold heavy drinks, red solo cups, cans, and plastic cups too! Look super cute and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my mom love to use our ice dragons for the pool. I'm a huge fan of dragons, so this was a must have for our pool! These are very durable, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsune

customer_reviews.title: Actually floats and holds your drink, it doesnt tip over. Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Holds cans and cups easily, even taller cans such as white claw and redbull, can hold insulated cups if you let a little air out. They really float, your can won't tip over, even in a lake with light waves, great purchase, very cute and actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Maya LaPrad

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical flamingos and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These flamingos are hysterically funny and I can’t wait to use them in the pool next summer. I couldn’t wait, so I tried them out in the spa tub and realized how sturdy they were with various containers (plastic drinking glasses or soda cans) the flamingos stayed upright and “held their own”.
customer_reviews.author: Blusie

customer_reviews.title: Good value and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Good value and super cute. Pro tip learned the hard way though, Yetis don’t float in unicorns. Hah!
customer_reviews.author: LoneTechWolf

customer_reviews.title: Float came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed as soon as we received the floats we blew them up and noticed one slowly started to deflate. It had a hole in the top straight from the package. Never even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a UF Florida Gator so these are awesome! I've used them several times while on the river and at a local sandbar, people went nuts over them. The hold is narrow, really only works with narrow bottles and narrow water bottles. But did great, didn't tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set as we really use them alot in the pool. They are great
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Check for Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: One of these had a leak right out of the box. I blew it up and it immediately started to deflate. As far as looks and function the other 2 are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JayH

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but one of them, popped, immediately after blowing it up. We now have a pair, rather than a trio of flamingos floating in our pool. One day later, the second one lost air...the company has emailed me, we shall see if they come through with replacements
customer_reviews.author: Ayz

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, But Is Hard To Inflate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, works well and does what it's supposed to. Looks great as well. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it was hard for us to inflate. Other than that, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kara G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE 'EM
customer_reviews.text: Have now bought nine of these....they sail around our pool holding lighted pond globes. I love them! They're charming. Worth having the smiles....vs the cheaper ones with no mouths. They're sort of like a flock of ducks moving across the pool. People constantly ask where we got them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Some leak but cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but some of the seams dont seal well. Don't have a pool so cant speak for how well they hold a drink while floating, just got them for fun.
customer_reviews.author: KristinH

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Cute but VERY hard to inflate - I think because they are so small. If you can’t close the spout within a microsecond all the air rushes out with a quickness I’ve never seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I also purchased the pink flamingos as well. I’d have to say these are my favorite! A must have for the pool parties!
customer_reviews.author: _2peach

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These adorable flamingo cup floats are cute and do the job. They hold steady and do not tip over while floating around the pool. I researched several similar products before purchasing these, and am so glad I went with them. They might be a little more pricey, but are well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mae Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea and summer drink buddies!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend but was there when she opened them. They are large and well-made. I especially liked how the noses of the "floatmingoes" had dimension and weren't just basic points. They float and were an absolute hit with passerbys when we used them in Jax beach.
customer_reviews.author: JCOOKIE

customer_reviews.title: this gets 2 stars only because they are so darn ...
customer_reviews.text: this gets 2 stars only because they are so darn cute but they do not hold much of any kind of beverage. Don't fill your red solo cups any more than half way or those suckers are flipping over. The design is just wrong. They need to widen and deepen the cup holder for it to be more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Laursen

customer_reviews.title: Functional AND cute
customer_reviews.text: Simply adorable. Loved watching these float around the pool. Anything too tall and heavy did not work and fell over, but it is perfect for short Tervis tumblers, solo cups, and cans. Planning on buying more to use as pool decoration (fill clear plastic solo cup with water and place a floating candle inside). Great cute functional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: staceym

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: These drink floats are great. You can keep your drink handy while you're floating. My youngest son actually took two of these and put them on his hands and pretended to have "hamburger hands"
customer_reviews.author: Christel Kellar

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: They were fun to use. Held our 16.9 and 20 oz easily. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Emersome Angeltoes

customer_reviews.title: who knows?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my niece. I think they were a hit, but with a teenage girl, who really knows?
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Pool Party
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these. They work well with the Solo cups as well as soda cans or glass beer bottles. The only thing to watch for is when your Solo cup or soda can is empty. They easily tip over or blow away when the drink is empty. If my cup is empty and I'm not quite ready for a refill, I just fill it with pool water to keep it upright. We have puppies so they were constantly knocking our drinks over when we set them on the side of the pool. These super cute and fun floaties solved that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Skygirl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended and will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This were a smash hit on our vacation to Mexico and Jamaica. Everyone was in envy and asking where we obtained these from. People should load up and sell these in the Carribbean at resorts. They would make a killing! We had no issues with duds or holes in our floaties as other reviewers mentioned and we bought a lot of sets for our friends and family. Highly recommended and will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, not so much in practice...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but won't even get a chance to try. They arrived very quickly, so I inflated them all to make sure no leaks before packing them for our Mexico vacation. One won't "plug" at all...it just pops right out. Granted, not a very expensive item, but silly to have to buy and spend time returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mgmt NinjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love!!! Durable and this is the 3rd season I've had them in the pool. Keep getting more to make a farm of unicorns. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mudgett

customer_reviews.title: So magical
customer_reviews.text: They held my drinks up when I could no longer. Must have been Unicorn magic. What more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: These were PERFECT for the pool and everyone was so jealous! Great for our bachelorette party!
customer_reviews.author: LAddington

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool party!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold a drink or even your phone! these were a total hit at our hotel pool!
customer_reviews.author: Xtina

customer_reviews.title: Cute pool accessory
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product. Purchased to match the giant unicorn float I have
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: These beverage floats were just as expected. Had to use a paperclip to get the valve flaps to open for inflation, but pretty easily done. Fits a regular beer/soda can and holds it in place. Did well floating in the pool with a few waves from the kids. Not sure if they will last more than one season as they are just basic vinyl floats, but good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Moriarta

customer_reviews.title: How fun are these?!
customer_reviews.text: How fun are these?! I love them. Think they are so cute. I’ve only just had them inflated and tried my can in them. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for any occasion! Easy to inflate and really keeps drinks at hand while enjoying the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamazoo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Need one to fit liter bottle
customer_reviews.text: They work great for cups, cans & water bottles. However because I drink so much water & from a liter bottle, mine did not fit. If you make anything that supports a liter bottle please let me know I've looked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda Wykes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: While these can definitely hold your drink and keep it a float, they wouldn’t stay inflated. I wanted to love these because they were so cute but the fact that they wouldn’t stay inflated was really frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: These things are really cute and they actually hold a bottle full of beer.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Arehart

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: They’re so cute, they look great in the pool. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They keep your drink afloat and upright even ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They keep your drink afloat and upright even in the ocean waves. The only thing of note is that the palm tree acts as a sort of sail, so if you let it go, the wind takes your precious drink away. I tried tying a string to it, but that was worse. It ended up acting as a nice way to trick me into exercising, as I had to swim to reach it. All in all, 10/10. I bought another pack.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: Have them looking for drink floats for the pool. Found these little gems. They are very functional and non-intrusive in the pool versus a large cooler. Very durable and they do not tip over unless they are empty. Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Msdolphin

product_meta.title: GoFloats Inflatable Pool Drink Holders (3 Pack) Designed in the US | Huge Selection from Unicorn, Flamingo, Palm and More | Float Your Hot Tub Drinks In Style
feature_bullets: UNIQUE DESIGN: Flamingle this summer with your flock of tropical flamingos
TURN HEADS: Float your drinks in style with 3 flamingo drink floats
VERSATILE USE: Perfect addition for the pool, hot tub, lakes, ocean and more
WON’T TIP OVER: Extra buoyant rafts designed to work with almost any size beverage
